amendment.description: To clarify reporting requirements for the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3930 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3930 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Bennet. (consideration: CR S5864; text: CR S5864) To clarify reporting requirements for the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3930 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Bennet.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3930 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
